meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Linda Leipheimer Ira Levine Roger Storm Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #463.

td.p: Linda Leipheimer, a homemaker from Encino, California
Ira Levine, a writer originally from Denver, Colorado
Roger Storm, a teacher from Fairview Park, Ohio (whose 3-day cash winnings total $19,401)

tr.td: SCULPTURE
FOREIGN WORDS
HISTORY
WOMEN AUTHORS
REGULAR JOES
WHO CARES?
(Alex: It does contain a great deal of information that very few people will have a positive reaction to!)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'From Greek for "a statue larger than life", it\'s a statue larger than life, like the one at Rhodes')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: From Greek for "a statue larger than life", it's a statue larger than life, like the one at Rhodes

RogerWho was God?
$1,799
the Lord')
